code: import React from"react";import{addNewPostCreator,updateNewPostCreator}from"../redux/profile-reducer";import Post from"./Post";import{connect}from"react-redux";var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{newPostText:state.profilePage,profilePage:state.profilePage};};var mapDispatchToProps=function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){return{onSendNewMessage:function onSendNewMessage(text){dispatch(updateNewPostCreator(text));},onClickNewPost:function onClickNewPost(){dispatch(addNewPostCreator());}};};var PostContainer=connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(Post);export default PostContainer;
